verbs.description: race [V: can] only help never harm applicants chances harvard university intentionally uses a vague personal rating to reject asian - american applicants in favor of students from other racial backgrounds according to lawyers on one side of a trial that began monday and carries weighty implications for dozens of other u s colleges harvard legal team denied any discrimination in its opening statement at boston federal courthouse saying race is just one factor that considered and can only help a student chances of getting admitted in its hour - long opening lawyers for students for fair admissions accused harvard of intentionally discriminating against asian - americans through a personal rating score that measures character traits such as courage and likeability race cambridge harvard illinois charles river boston william lee william fitzsimmons harvard adam mortara harvard university photo charles krupa

[ARG0: race] [ARGM-MOD: can] [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: help] [ARG1: never harm applicants chances] harvard university intentionally uses a vague personal rating to reject asian - american applicants in favor of students from other racial backgrounds according to lawyers on one side of a trial that began monday and carries weighty implications for dozens of other u s colleges harvard legal team denied any discrimination in its opening statement at boston federal courthouse saying race is just one factor that considered and can only help a student chances of getting admitted in its hour - long opening lawyers for students for fair admissions accused harvard of intentionally discriminating against asian - americans through a personal rating score that measures character traits such as courage and likeability race cambridge harvard illinois charles river boston william lee william fitzsimmons harvard adam mortara harvard university photo charles krupa
